dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I was really struck by the stat about orphans—82 percent are raised in Kazakh families. That's such a high rate of domestic care.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's actually really encouraging. And it sounds like things are improving—over 3,000 children found new homes just this year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's actually really encouraging. And it sounds like things are improving-over three thousand children found new homes just this year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In 2024, more than 3,000 children found new homes, 330 adults became mentors, and the staff of guardianship authorities increased 2.5 times.
